      • addSubscriber

        public java.lang.String addSubscriber​(java.lang.String id,
                                      java.lang.String fullName,
                                      int age,
                                      int hoursToConsume)
        Method that creates a subscriber with all its settable attributes

        Precondition: The user selected the option to add a new subscriber in the menu and entered all the relevant data to the program

        Postcondition: A message that may indicate the creation of a new subscriber inside the subscriber array or not

        Parameters:
        id - identification of the new subscriber
        fullName - full name of the new subscriber
        age - age of the new subscriber
        hoursToConsume - hours that the new subscriber is willing to consume
        Returns:
        a message indicating the result of the operation

      • deactivateSubscriber

        public java.lang.String deactivateSubscriber​(int pos)
        Deactivates a subscriber according to user input and returns a message indicating the result of the operation

        Precondition: At least one subscriber exists. The user selected the option to deactivate a subscriber in the menu, and entered the position of the subscriber according to a list that contains all of the subscribers

        Postcondition: A message indicates if the subscriber is deactivated or not. This meaning that the active value would be set to false and the type set to NORMAL

        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the list that indicates the subscriber that will be deactivated
        Returns:
        a message indicating the result of the operation

      • checkSubscriberAvailability

        public boolean checkSubscriberAvailability()
        Checks the availability of the subscriber array in order to add more subscribers

        Precondition: The method is called in addSubscriber

        Postcondition: The availability of the subscriber array is stated

        Returns:
        a boolean indicating the availability of the subscriber array

      • checkSubscriberExistence

        public boolean checkSubscriberExistence()
        Checks the existence of at least one subscriber in the subscriber array

        Precondition: The user wants to interact with methods that require at least one subscriber

        Postcondition: The existence of at least one subscriber is stated

        Returns:
        a boolean indicating the existence of at least one subscriber in the subscriber array

      • searchSubscriber

        public Subscriber searchSubscriber​(java.lang.String id)
        Looks for a subscriber by its id and returns it

        Precondition: At least one subscriber exists and the user is going to modify or interact in a certain way with a specific subscriber

        Postcondition: A reference to the subscriber is returned

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the subscriber to be found
        Returns:
        a subscriber that has the same id as the one that was entered

      • printActiveSubscribersByType

        public java.lang.String printActiveSubscribersByType()
        Returns total active subscribers and a list stating the number of active subscribers by type

        Precondition: At least one subscriber exists and the user selected the option to print the active subscribers by type in the menu

        Postcondition: The list is returned

        Returns:
        total active subscribers and a list with the active subscribers by type

      • printMinorMostHoursSub

        public java.lang.String printMinorMostHoursSub()
        Returns the name of under-aged user with the most hours willing to consume

        Precondition: At least one subscriber exists and the user selected the option to print the minor user with most hours to consume in the menu

        Postcondition: The name of the requested subscriber is returned

        Returns:
        the name of the under-aged subscriber with the most hours willing to consume

      • printSubscribers

        public java.lang.String printSubscribers()
        Returns a list containing all of the subscribers at the moment with their respective information

        Precondition: The user selected an option that requires the subscribers to be shown in the menu (e.g. deactivate a subscriber)

        Postcondition: The list is returned

        Returns:
        a list with all of the current subscribers represented in Strings

      • addProduct

        public java.lang.String addProduct​(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String nameOfDirector,
                                   java.lang.String synopsis,
                                   java.time.LocalDate premierDate,
                                   java.lang.String[] protagonists,
                                   boolean censored,
                                   java.lang.String censorMotif)
        An overloaded method to add a product. In this case, it is used to add a show

        Precondition: The user selected the option to add a new show in the menu and entered all the relevant data to the program

        Postcondition: A message that may indicate the creation of a new show inside the product array or not

        Parameters:
        name - name of the new show
        nameOfDirector - name of the director of the new show
        synopsis - synopsis of the new show
        premierDate - date in which the show premiered (first emission)
        protagonists - a string array indicating the protagonists of the new show
        censored - boolean to determine if the new show has been censored or not
        censorMotif - the censor motif of the new show
        Returns:
        a message indicating the result of the operation

      • addProduct

        public java.lang.String addProduct​(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String nameOfDirector,
                                   java.lang.String synopsis,
                                   java.time.LocalDate premierDate,
                                   java.lang.String producer,
                                   int minimumWatchAge,
                                   java.lang.String trailerUrl,
                                   int movieCategorySelection)
        An overloaded method to add a product. In this case, it is used to add a movie

        Precondition: The user selected the option to add a new movie in the menu and entered all the relevant data to the program

        Postcondition: A message that may indicate the creation of a new movie inside the product array or not

        Parameters:
        name - name of the new movie
        nameOfDirector - name of the director of the new movie
        synopsis - synopsis of the new movie
        premierDate - date in which the movie premiered (first emission)
        producer - the name of the producer of the new movie
        minimumWatchAge - the minimum age required to watch the new movie
        trailerUrl - the URL in which the trailer for the new movie can be found
        movieCategorySelection - a selection of the movie category (1: Romantic, 2: Action, 3: Suspense, 4: Horror, 5: Comedy)
        Returns:
        a message indicating the result of the operation

      • addSeasonToShow

        public java.lang.String addSeasonToShow​(java.lang.String nameOfShow,
                                        int scheduledEpisodes,
                                        java.time.LocalDate premierDate,
                                        java.lang.String trailerUrl)
        Adds a season to a specified show

        Precondition: At least one show exists and the user selected the option to add a new season to a show in the menu and entered all the relevant data to the program

        Postcondition: A message that may indicate the creation of a new season inside the show or not

        Parameters:
        nameOfShow - name of the show in which the season will be stored
        scheduledEpisodes - number of the scheduled episodes
        premierDate - premier date of the new season
        trailerUrl - the URL in which the trailer for the new season can be found
        Returns:
        a message indicating the result of the opertation

      • checkProductAvailability

        public boolean checkProductAvailability()
        Checks the availability of the product array in order to add more products

        Precondition: The method is called in addProduct

        Postcondition: The availability of the product array is stated

        Returns:
        a boolean indicating the availability of the product array

      • checkProductExistence

        public boolean checkProductExistence()
        Checks the existence of at least one product in the product array

        Precondition: The user wants to interact with methods that require at least one product

        Postcondition: The existence of at least one product is stated

        Returns:
        a boolean indicating the existence of at least one product in the product array

      • searchProduct

        public Product searchProduct​(java.lang.String name)
        Looks for a product by its name and returns it

        Precondition: At least one product exists and the user is going to modify or interact in a certain way with a specific product

        Postcondition: A reference to the product is returned

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the product to be found
        Returns:
        a product that has the same name as the one that was entered

      • printProductInfo

        public java.lang.String printProductInfo​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the information of the given product name

        Precondition: At least one product exists and the user selected the option to show a specific product information in the menu

        Postcondition: The product information is returned or a message indicating that the product does not exist

        Parameters:
        name - name of the product to print
        Returns:
        the product information or a message indicating that the product was not found

      • printMoviesOfCategory

        public java.lang.String printMoviesOfCategory​(int categorySelection)
        Returns a list with the information of movies according to a category

        Precondition: At least one product exists and the user selected the option to print the movies by category in the menu

        Postcondition: The list is returned or a messsage indicating that there are no movies matching the category

        Parameters:
        categorySelection - the selection of the movie category
        Returns:
        a list with the information of the movies matching the category or a message indicating its absence

      • printShowsWithLastSeasons

        public java.lang.String printShowsWithLastSeasons()
        Returns the seasons information along with the information of their last seasons

        Precondition: At least one product exists and the user selected the option to print shows in the menu

        Postcondition: The list is returned or a message indicating that there are no shows yet

        Returns:
        a list with the information of the shows and their last seasons, or a message indicating its absence
